Uses of Class
sanavesa.net.Server

    • Uses of Server in sanavesa.net

      Fields in sanavesa.net declared as Server 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Server ServerThread.server
      The server owner of this thread.
      private Server ServerClient.server
      The server this client is connected to.
      Methods in sanavesa.net with type parameters of type Server 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default <T extends Server>
      void      		 NetworkSerializable.handleOnServer(T server, ServerClient sender)
      This method is invoked on the server side whenever this object is read by the server.
      <T extends Server>
      void      		 DisconnectClientPacket.handleOnServer(T server, ServerClient sender)
      This method is invoked whenever the client requests for server to disconnect.
      Constructors in sanavesa.net with parameters of type Server 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerClient(Server server, java.net.Socket socket)
      Constructs a new client on the server.
      ServerThread(Server server)
      Creates a new thread for the server, and calls begins the networking communication loop.
